= System Requirements =

The Jagornet DHCPv6 Server is implemented in Java, and requires an operating environment supporting the Java 6 platform.  The following operating environments have been successfully tested.

  * Linux 2.6 - Sun JRE 6
  * Solaris 10 - Sun JRE 6
  * Windows XP SP2 - Sun JRE 6
  * Windows 7 - Sun JRE 6
  * MacOSX 10.5 - Apple JRE 6
